title: Leona or Sona
body:
i got enough IP for one or the other, 
i get put support alot and usually morg but if shes taken im screwed as i suck at thresh and blitz gets banned 

should i l get leona or sona? Leona looks good when i play against her

replies.body:
Really depends on your preference. Leona is a tanky-burst-initiator with CC (stuns for DAYS), while Sona is a fragile stick with the poke equal to being run over by a train the first few levels (Power Chord Q), then transitions to semi-mage as the game progresses.
If you want a competitively viable support, then pick Leona. If you prefer poke lanes over kill lanes, pick Sona.
If you want the best support for you, play both of them and see which one you like better.
MY personal preference is Leona, because 9/10 times no one on your team plays tank. Not only that, but there are very few circumstances where I feel she is not useful; if you're not useful in lane (e.g. vs Zyra you can't do anything), you're useful in teamfights (low CD stun, root, and an AoE stun).

EDIT: Just re-read your post and saw you suck at Thresh. Do you suck at him because you can't land hooks or because you don't know your role as a tanky support?
If you suck at hooks, then Leona is a lot more forgiving as her E passes through minions (so you can get to champs behind them). If you suck at melee champs in general, then I'd suggest Sona. If you suck at tanky supports, Leona is one of the more beginner friendly ones, so long as you know when to engage the enemy team.
Sorry about the long post, I just thought I'd be thorough with my explanation so you can make the decision right for you. GLHF

That depends. Sona is a poke-based support, and is good against other AP support like Annie, Janna, or Nami. She's my favorite.
On the other hand, Leona is more of an aggressive, get in your face kind of Support. She's good against Sona, in fact her main counter.

It's up to you whether you like aggressive playstyle or poking and be on the safer side. It also depends on the ADC picked. For a more overall support choice, I'd say Leona is a bit better. It is also easier to play than Sona, because she's super squishy and wrong positioning will land the other team first blood.
Much better explanation than my 10 minute one :P
